statements: SELECT * FROM data_lake;
SELECT file_name, file_type, upload_date FROM data_lake;
SELECT id, data_size FROM data_lake WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_lake ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, data_size FROM data_lake WHERE data_size > 100 ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_lake;
SELECT id, file_name, file_type, upload_date, data_size FROM data_lake ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT id, file_type, data_size FROM data_lake WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY data_size DESC, upload_date ASC;
SELECT id, file_name, file_type, upload_date FROM data_lake WHERE file_type LIKE '%csv%' ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT id, file_size, upload_date FROM data_lake WHERE file_name LIKE '%data%' AND file_size > 5000 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DataLake;
SELECT data_id, file_name FROM DataLake ORDER BY file_name DESC;
SELECT file_type, data_content FROM DataLake WHERE data_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DataTags WHERE tag_name = 'important' ORDER BY data_id;
SELECT data_id, file_type, file_name FROM DataLake WHERE data_content LIKE '%keyword%';
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM DataLake WHERE data_id = 1;
SELECT data_id, file_name, file_type FROM DataLake WHERE data_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM DataLake WHERE file_type = 'csv';
SELECT data_id, tag_name FROM DataTags WHERE data_id = 1 ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT file_name, file_type, tag_name FROM DataLake JOIN DataTags ON DataLake.data_id = DataTags.data_id WHERE DataLake.data_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DataLake;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM DataLake;
SELECT id, file_name, upload_time FROM DataLake WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Tags WHERE tag_name = 'important';
SELECT DataLake.*, Tags.tag_name FROM DataLake JOIN DataTags ON DataLake.id = DataTags.id JOIN Tags ON DataTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM DataLake;
SELECT id, file_name, upload_time FROM DataLake ORDER BY upload_time DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_time FROM DataLake WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT d.file_name, t.tag_name FROM DataLake d JOIN DataTags dt ON d.id = dt.id JOIN Tags t ON dt.tag_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT d.id, d.file_name, t.tag_name FROM DataLake d LEFT JOIN DataTags dt ON d.id = dt.id LEFT JOIN Tags t ON dt.tag_id = t.tag_id ORDER BY d.id ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT record_id, record_data FROM data_records WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM data_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_connections WHERE destination_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT source_type, COUNT(*) FROM data_sources GROUP BY source_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT ds.source_name, dc.category_name FROM data_sources ds JOIN data_categories dc ON ds.id = dc.category_id;

SELECT dr.record_id, ds.source_name, dc.category_name FROM data_records dr JOIN data_sources ds ON dr.source_id = ds.id JOIN data_categories dc ON dr.record_id = dc.category_id WHERE dr.record_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ds.source_name, COUNT(dc.category_id) AS category_count FROM data_sources ds LEFT JOIN data_categories dc ON ds.id = dc.category_id GROUP BY ds.source_name HAVING COUNT(dc.category_id) > 0;
SELECT * FROM data_lake_files;
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM data_lake_files ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM data_lake_files WHERE file_type = 'csv';
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value from data_lake_metadata WHERE file_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM data_lake_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'archive%';
SELECT * FROM data_lake_files ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM data_lake_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM data_lake_files JOIN data_lake_metadata ON data_lake_files.file_id = data_lake_metadata.file_id;

SELECT file_name, tag_name FROM data_lake_files JOIN data_lake_file_tags ON data_lake_files.file_id = data_lake_file_tags.file_id JOIN data_lake_tags ON data_lake_file_tags.tag_id = data_lake_tags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM data_lake_files WHERE file_id IN (SELECT file_id FROM data_lake_metadata WHERE metadata_key = 'author' AND metadata_value = 'Alice');
